description_html: Inspired by the natural beauty and elegance of the Aspen tree line in her favorite ski resort, Rosemary created this calm and organically patterned rug. The combination of 85% silk with natural bleached nettle fabricated in 150-knots make this rug a truly luxurious addition to a bedroom or living room.
product_name: 150 Knot Nettle and Silk Aspen Rug in Demitasse Colorway
